body.name: [Auto Focus/6D Keystone]PR350 Portable Mini Projector with 5G WiFi 6 and Bluetooth, Native 4K 1080P Outdoor Video Projector, Smart Home Theater System Compatible with iOS/Android/HDMI/USB

features: 【Advanced Auto Focus & Auto 6D/4P Keystone Correction】Experience the convenience of the ALLIWAWA PR350 portable projector with its enhanced auto-focus and 6D auto-keystone technology. Enjoy clear rectangular pictures within seconds of startup, as the built-in displacement sensor ensures continuous focus adjustment and image correction, even if the projector is moved.

【Sealed Optical Engine & Native 1080P & 300 ANSI Lumens】 The PR350 mini projector features a fully sealed optical core that is dust-resistant, effectively reducing image quality degradation and black spots. Enjoy the vibrant colors and high brightness of 300 ANSI lumens from this 1080p projector. With native 1080P support and compatibility for 4K videos, it provides an exceptional viewing experience with remarkable shadow detail – a true home theater experience.

【300-inch Large Display & Zoom Function】 The PR350 video projector offers image size adjustments from 80% to 100% without requiring you to move the projector, allowing for a massive 300 inch viewing experience. Its built-in sensor and 6-way gyroscope automatically adjust the screen to a rectangle, even when the projector is moving, making it an excellent outdoor projector and movie projector. The zoom function caters to different screen sizes without compromising on image quality.

【High-speed WiFi 6 & Bluetooth 5.2 & Multiple Device Connection】 This 4K projector doubles as a WiFi projector, providing stable and uninterrupted content transmission with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2. Say farewell to delays and interruptions during games or wireless projection. It easily connects with iOS, Android, and laptop devices for a seamless smart home projector experience. The indoor projector also supports HDMI/USB input and audio output, allowing connection with diverse devices such as P

【Important Notices & Reliable Service】Please note that some apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu may not support screen mirroring due to copyright protections. However, the projector supports Android 11.0 upgrades and app installations. Projector Remote doesn't come with batteries. ALLIWAVA portable provides full 1-year product support and lifetime after-sales assistance. Feel free to reach out to us via email if you have any queries or concerns. We are always here to assist.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How can I stream Netflix or YouTube content on this PR350 projector? Due to HDCP copyright,only tv stick can stream Netflix, Amazon Prime and Hulu, tv stick is not included in the package, you need to buy it seperately. Highly recommend taking a few minutes to install Android 11. How to install Android 11? Please contact the ALLIWAVA Customer Support team, and we will gladly assist you. Why does the projection only have images but no sound? Due to copyright issue,the sound of some Netflix videos may not work, please turn of the Dolby sound to make the sound work properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to experience the PR350 Portable Mini Projector, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed. This projector redefines the concept of a home theater system, combining the latest technology with user-friendly features.Firstly, the Auto Focus and 6D Keystone correction are standout features. They ensure that no matter where you set it up, you get a perfectly focused and aligned image without any manual hassle. This is particularly useful for outdoor movie nights where adjusting the projector can be a bit tricky.The 5G WiFi 6 and Bluetooth capabilities are another highlight. The projector's ability to seamlessly connect to a variety of devices is remarkable. Whether it's streaming from an iOS or Android device or connecting via HDMI or USB, the process is smooth and efficient.As for the video quality, the native 4K 1080P resolution is a game-changer. The image clarity and color accuracy are exceptional, bringing a cinematic quality to your viewing experience. Whether it's movies, sports, or gaming, the visual fidelity is stunning.The compact and portable design of the PR350 is the cherry on top. It's easy to transport and set up, making it ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. Whether it's a family movie night in the backyard or a presentation at work, this projector is incredibly versatile.In summary, the PR350 Portable Mini Projector is a fantastic investment for anyone looking to enhance their visual entertainment experience. Its combination of high-tech features, superb image quality, and ease of use make it a standout product in the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using it for almost a month now, and it is running smoothly. The user manual is super easy to understand, and it is simple to set up anywhere. Make sure you have a power source nearby. The picture quality is excellent, and the audio is nice and clear without distortion. My daughter loves to watch cartoons on the wall now. It will connect to a smartphone via Bluetooth or from Cast smoothly. There are no lags. The projector looks stylish, small, and compact. A good experience so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is light weight and looks nice. It’s easy to set up. The picture quality is very good. It’s simple to hook your phone,fire stick, or Roku up and stream movies on it. It comes with auto focus which is very nice. A great projector at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect projector
reviews.reviewText: The ALLIWAWA PR350 projector is like magic – no more messing with manual adjustments. It kicks off with auto-focus and nifty 6D auto-keystone, giving you a sharp picture in 5 seconds. Dust? Not a chance, thanks to its sealed optical engine. Pumping out 300 ANSI lumens, native 1080P, and 4K support, it's a home theater champ. Want a giant 300-inch screen without shuffling stuff around? Done. Plus, it hooks up with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for smooth connections. Say hi to gaming without hiccups. It's not just a projector; it's a cool, hassle-free movie buddy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The little powerful projector
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My first reason to buy this projector was how it looked so cute and compact compared to others in my opinion. We hava an expensive epson one for our movie room and it was so hard to connect and regulate the screen settings. It took almost an hour for us to figure it out.we bought this one for our backyard and something to carrying around. It took for us only 10-15 mins to start watching . So so easy to install. Connected to the phone with no issues. Screen quality and sound is perfect what we needed. Very satisfied with the product , i can suggest if you are looking something with good screen quality ,easy to install and carry wherever you go , i think you can’t go wrong with this projector.oh and I forgot i loved how it focused automatically it is a great pro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Back Yard Movie night's
reviews.reviewText: The ALLIWAWA PR350 projector is an awesome and slick looking projector. Simple to set up over Wi-Fi or Bluetooth, also nice thing about this projector is no more messing with manual adjustments. It kicks off with auto-focus and nifty 6D auto-keystone, giving you a sharp picture and crisp picture quality right of the bet. Th autofocus feature is very convenient so that you don't have to manually do focusing to clear the blur and size adjustments, this makes it fast and convenient for a back yard movie night with the kids. This was a pleasant purchase and will be using it to make lot of memories with our kids.Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my presentation buddy!
reviews.reviewText: I consult with dog owners to help them with dog obedience and having a portable easy-to-use projector to show pre-recorded dog incidents and misbehaving and how to work with the them to improve. I have the movie files saved on my phone and make sure the phone is charged up and have an extra battery in case I need it.We rent a school gymnasium which has a stage. We can dim the lights and the projector works perfect for my needs. I put it on a tripod. It's nice looking and portable with is appealing. I don't have time to mess around with settings and it was so easy to set up over both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. What makes it even more convenient is that i do not have to fiddle around with manual adjustments. When you start it up, there is auto-focus and practical 6D auto-keystone so you get a sharp picture immediately. A feature like that is so convenient and saves time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tech in small body
reviews.reviewText: We really like this projector, it looks cute straight out of the box. Great size and weight. It’s basically plug and play doesn’t need to go through longs setting up process. Based on the projection distance it adjust the project size which is dynamic. The picture quality is good and the sound is amazing. It’s loud and crisp. I like it has option to mount it on the tripod so you can carry and mount it anywhere. Good gift option to consider. Comes with remote which is easy to use. You can share your device using AirPlay or use usb to connect your phone or use hdmi to connect pc.
